title: Unable to copy & paste from Local drive to a server connected thru mRemote
author: pchackoCAS
body_snippet:
Hi,

I am using mRemote 1.77.0.41252 to easily access my various servers. There are times I need to copy & paste between mRemote sessions and my local machine but the paste function does not work when I attempt to do that. Is this a set up issue? How do I resolve it?

Thanks
Paul
